meta.description: Optimize the production of regular and tempered glass panes to maximize profit given machine time constraints.

sets.name: GLASS_TYPES
sets.description: Types of glass panes produced by the factory.

params.name: heating_time
params.description: Time required on the heating machine for each type of glass pane.

params.name: cooling_time
params.description: Time required on the cooling machine for each type of glass pane.

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per pane for each type of glass.

params.name: max_time
params.description: Maximum available time per day on each machine.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of panes to produce for each type of glass.

objective.name: max_profit
objective.description: Maximize the total profit from producing glass panes.

constraints.name: heating_machine_time
constraints.description: Total time on the heating machine must not exceed available time.

constraints.name: cooling_machine_time
constraints.description: Total time on the cooling machine must not exceed available time.
